title: Believe Then You Can Achieve
itunes:title: Believe Then You Can Achieve
description:
In this episode of TGC we have 2 young entrepreneurs in the studio, Harry Jackson, CEO of Jackson Family Human Services where they have a program that help's so called "hard to manage" children and RC Osborne who went from possibly becoming a career criminal and convict to earning a Masters degree and becoming a Professor. We want to start spotlighting those who have made positive changes in their lives. If you have a story that you want to share, please email us at thegangsterchroniclespodcast@gmail.com See omnystudio.com/policies/listener for privacy information.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
